author: Arthur Damian
title: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 Is Getting Terrible Steam Ratings After Rough Launch
text:
Another year, another flight sim from Microsoft. However, compared to 2020‚Äôs entry, Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 is getting destroyed in Steam reviews due to a disastrous launch.
As Polygon noted, Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 has been having trouble since its launch on Tuesday. Among the most prevalent issues are long loading times and missing content. Due to these problems, the game currently has an ‚Äúoverwhelmingly negative‚Äù Steam rating.
Trying to fan the flames of discontent, Microsoft Flight Simulator head Jorg Neumann blamed the massive amount of players for the mess. ‚ÄúWe knew the excitement was high for Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 , but frankly, we completely underestimated how high, and it really has overwhelmed our infrastructure.‚Äù Developer Asobo‚Äôs CEO, Sebastian Wloch, added that while his team tested the servers with a whopping 200,000 player simulation, the number of actual humans trying to play the title eclipsed that number. Even trying to limit the amount of gamers accessing the sim at one time proved ineffective.
What exactly are players experiencing? Hours spent waiting on loading screens, crashes, and missing models and textures are just a taste of the difficulties facing Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 . One user on Steam named VonBarb even quipped the simulation was too true to reality, stating, ‚Äú‚Ä¶ it now feels like Boeing was actually involved in building the servers.‚Äù Speaking as someone wary of flying on Boeing planes, this must be quite a disastrous launch.
For their part, both Microsoft and Asobo are planning on fixes, though they did not give a timeline for them. Regardless, the companies should have seen this coming. Microsoft Flight Simulator was a big deal in 2020, especially due to the pandemic. It was a way of experiencing the joy of flight at a time when we could not leave our homes. Though people‚Äôs lives have steadily returned to normal since then, the simulation is still a welcome break from reality. Hopefully, the team can get things back up and running soon.

author: newsdirectory3
title: Cyclist Dies After Lorry Collision in North Dublin
text:
Cyclist ‚ÄãKilled in dublin Collision, Police ‚ÄãSeek‚Äå Witnesses Dublin, Ireland ‚Äì A cyclist in his‚Äå 50s tragically lost his life after‚Äå being struck by a ‚Äçlorry ‚Äãin north Dublin on Tuesday afternoon.The incident occured around 4:30 p.m. at the junction of College Road and Castleknock Village.
The cyclist‚Äôs body was transported to the mortuary at Connolly Hospital Blanchardstown, where a‚Å§ post-mortem examination will be conducted.
Following the ‚Å¢collision, the Castleknock Road through Castleknock‚Å§ Village was ‚Äçtemporarily closed to allow for a technical examination of the scene. The road has since reopened to traffic.
Authorities are‚Å§ urging anyone who ‚Å§may have witnessed the collision‚Äå to come forward with information. Garda√≠ are especially interested in speaking with any‚Äç road ‚Å¢users who may have‚Äå dashcam ‚Äãfootage from the area at the time of‚Å§ the incident.
Anyone with‚Äç information is‚Å§ asked to contact Blanchardstown Garda Station at 01 ‚Å£666 7000, the Garda Confidential Line at 1800 666 111,‚Å§ or any Garda station.
Cyclist ‚Å£Fatality Prompts‚Äç Witness Appeal‚Å¢ in North Dublin Dublin, ‚Å§Ireland ‚Äì NewsDirectory3.com spoke ‚Å¢with road safety expert, Sarah O‚ÄôConnell, following the tragic death of a‚Äã cyclist ‚Å§in north Dublin. ‚ÄãMs. O‚ÄôConnell expressed her deep condolences to the victimS family and highlighted‚Å£ the urgency of the Garda√≠‚Äôs appeal ‚Å¢for witnesses.
‚ÄúEvery road fatality is ‚Å£a tragedy, ‚Äçand it‚Äôs vital that we understand ‚Å§the ‚Äãcircumstances surrounding this incident,‚Äù Ms. O‚ÄôConnell stated. ‚ÄúThe Garda√≠ are right to seek out any‚Äå available evidence, particularly dashcam footage, which ‚Å§can ‚Å¢provide critical ‚Å§insights into the moments leading up ‚Å¢to the collision.‚Äù
Ms. O‚ÄôConnell emphasized the importance‚Äå of road ‚Å£user vigilance, particularly ‚Å£in areas with heavy traffic. ‚ÄúDrivers and cyclists alike need‚Äå to‚Å£ be ‚Å£extra cautious at ‚Å¢junctions‚Äã and ‚Å¢intersections, where visibility can be limited. We all share a responsibility to prioritize safety ‚Å£on the roads.‚Äù ‚Äç
The ‚Äåinvestigation into the collision is ongoing, and Ms. O‚ÄôConnell urged anyone with facts to come ‚Å£forward. ‚Äù Even seemingly‚Äã minor details could be crucial in piecing together what ‚Äçhappened.‚Äã Your cooperation could help prevent future ‚Å¢tragedies.‚Äù

author: RFI
title: Un ferry charg√© de carburant coul√© par une attaque ukrainienne dans un port russe
text: Alors que les yeux sont tourn√©s sur l‚Äôoffensive ukrainienne dans la r√©gion de Koursk en Russie et sur l‚Äôavanc√©e des troupes russes dans le Donbass vers la localit√© de Prokovsk, Kiev continue de frapper des cibles strat√©giques russes. Jeudi 22 ao√ªt, un ferry transportant des citernes de carburant a √©t√© vis√© dans un port russe situ√© en face de la Crim√©e annex√©e. Ce navire a finalement coul√©. Publi√© le : Malgr√© l‚Äôarriv√©e d‚Äôune centaine de secouristes et d‚Äôun train sp√©cial de lutte contre les incendies, le ferry, cibl√© par une attaque ukrainienne dans le port russe de Kavkaz a fini par couler, jeudi 22 ao√ªt. Il contenait trente citernes de carburant. ¬´ Du fait des dommages subis, le ferry a coul√© dans les eaux du port de Kavkaz. Il n'y a pas de foyer d'incendie dans le port ¬ª, a indiqu√© sur Telegram le service op√©rationnel de la r√©gion russe de Krasnodar (sud-ouest), qui avait d√©nonc√© plus t√¥t une attaque du ¬´ r√©gime de Kiev ¬ª contre ce navire. L‚Äô√©quipage √©tait, semble-t-il, √† bord lors de cette attaque dans le port de Kavkaz, situ√© dans le d√©troit de Kertch, qui s√©pare la Russie de la Crim√©e annex√©e par Moscou en 2014. Deux membres d'√©quipage du ferry sont port√©s disparus et 17 autres ont pu √™tre sauv√©s, a indiqu√© le gouverneur r√©gional, Veniamine Kondratiev. Viser des points strat√©giques Apr√®s les attaques en 2022 et 2023 contre le pont reliant la Crim√©e au continent, Moscou avaient √©t√© oblig√© de trouver d'autres moyens pour ravitailler la Crim√©e. Ce ferry faisait partie de ces moyens de ravitaillement. L‚Äô Ukraine continue de pilonner des cibles strat√©giques avec des drones et des missiles. Les d√©p√¥ts de carburant font partie des cibles prioritaires. Dimanche 18 ao√ªt, Kiev avait frapp√© un d√©p√¥t de carburant dans la ville de Proletarsk, dans la r√©gion de Rostov. Cette attaque a provoqu√© un √©norme incendie, qui n‚Äô√©tait toujours pas √©teint, malgr√© l‚Äôintervention de plusieurs centaines de pompiers et d‚Äôavions. Cette attaque avait √©t√© men√©e √† plusieurs centaines de kilom√®tres de la fronti√®re ukrainienne. √Ä lire et √† √©couter aussi Guerre en Ukraine: ¬´Les Russes avancent lentement, mais de plus en plus vite¬ª dans le Donbass NewsletterRecevez toute l'actualit√© internationale directement dans votre boite mail Je m'abonne

author: Matthew Mccully
title: Mental health struggles surge among Quebec‚Äôs teens
text:
Mental health struggles surge among Quebec‚Äôs teens 19 December 2024 at 17 h 54 min Reading time: 2 min 30 s Dr. Tina Montreuil, Associate Professor at McGill University, shared her insights on the rising mental health challenges among Qu√©bec high school students, emphasizing the importance of community support and actionable solutions (Photo : McGill University) By William Crooks
Local Journalism Initiative
A newly released report from the Institut de la statistique du Qu√©bec highlights a worrying trend: a sharp rise in mental health issues among high school students over the past decade. The report, which draws on data from over 70,000 students in French and English schools across Quebec, underscores alarming increases in anxiety, depression, and other disorders‚Äîissues that experts like Dr. Tina Montreuil emphasize need urgent attention.
Dr. Montreuil, an Associate Professor in Educational and Counselling Psychology at McGill University, reflected on the findings during a recent interview. ‚ÄúThis report provides a snapshot of how mental health among teenagers has evolved over the past ten years,‚Äù she noted. While some conditions like attention deficit disorders have long been present, new phenomena, such as eco-anxiety, have emerged as significant concerns.
Stark statistics on youth mental health
The report paints a grim picture: professionally diagnosed anxiety disorders rose from 9 per cent in 2010‚Äì2011 to 20 per cent in 2022‚Äì2023. Depression also climbed from 4.9 per cent to 7 per cent, and eating disorders showed the most dramatic increase, from 1.8 per cent to 5 per cent. Attention deficit disorders now affect a staggering 25 per cent of students, up from 13 per cent in 2010.
The data also reveals gender disparities. Girls are disproportionately affected by anxiety (8 per cent take medication compared to 3.8 per cent of boys), depression, and eco-anxiety‚Äîa newer metric that tracks stress tied to environmental concerns. The decline in self-esteem was also more pronounced in girls, dropping from 15 per cent in 2010 to just 7 per cent in 2023. For boys, the decline was smaller but still significant, falling from 24 per cent to 16 per cent in the same period.
Dr. Montreuil pointed out, ‚ÄúEco-anxiety is a reflection of our increasing awareness of climate change and the stress it induces, especially in younger generations who feel they have little control over the situation.‚Äù
Factors behind the numbers
While the pandemic has been blamed for rising mental health challenges, Dr. Montreuil argued it‚Äôs not the sole culprit. ‚ÄúInterestingly, the steepest increase in issues occurred before the pandemic,‚Äù she explained. ‚ÄúDuring the pandemic, there was more awareness and discussion about mental health, which might have temporarily slowed the upward trend. Parents were more present, and there was a surge in available resources.‚Äù
Dr. Montreuil emphasized that increased awareness and better diagnostic tools also contribute to the rising numbers. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre more attuned to what anxiety looks like, which leads to more diagnoses,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúBut there‚Äôs no denying societal factors, like social media, play a role. Platforms like TikTok and Instagram amplify social comparison, contributing to low self-esteem and even eating disorders.‚Äù

author: El Siglo de Durango
title: Beca Benito Ju√°rez: ¬øde cu√°nto es el √∫ltimo apoyo para los estudiantes en este 2024?
text:
Beca Benito Ju√°rez: ¬øde cu√°nto es el √∫ltimo apoyo para los estudiantes en este 2024?
[EMILIO BARRIENTOS](/archivo/?q=EMILIO BARRIENTOS&busqueda=autor)
Los estudiantes de educaci√≥n b√°sica y media superior inscritos en el programa Beca Benito Ju√°rez recibir√°n el √∫ltimo apoyo econ√≥mico del a√±o este mes de diciembre. Este pago representa un alivio econ√≥mico significativo para las familias, en especial por los retrasos acumulados en meses previos. En total, el monto para este nivel ser√° de 3,680 pesos, cubriendo dos bimestres: septiembre-octubre y noviembre-diciembre.
Apoyo para estudiantes de nivel superior
En el caso de los j√≥venes inscritos en universidades p√∫blicas bajo la modalidad de Beca J√≥venes Escribiendo el Futuro, el monto destinado es notablemente mayor, alcanzando los 11,200 pesos.
Este apoyo tambi√©n corresponde al acumulado de los dos √∫ltimos bimestres del ciclo. Se trata de un impulso clave para estudiantes en situaci√≥n de vulnerabilidad, quienes suelen enfrentar mayores desaf√≠os econ√≥micos durante sus estudios.
Los beneficiarios deben estar atentos a las notificaciones oficiales del programa, ya que el pago se realiza de forma directa a las cuentas registradas o a trav√©s de operativos especiales en localidades sin acceso bancario.
Es crucial verificar el estatus de la beca mediante los canales habilitados, como el buscador oficial con la CURP, para garantizar que no existan contratiempos en la recepci√≥n.
Con un alcance nacional, las Becas Benito Ju√°rez buscan garantizar que ning√∫n estudiante abandone sus estudios por falta de recursos econ√≥micos. Este programa ha sido fundamental para disminuir la brecha de desigualdad educativa y ofrecer oportunidades a los sectores m√°s vulnerables.
Este cierre de a√±o pone en evidencia la importancia de estos apoyos, no solo para las familias beneficiadas, sino tambi√©n como una herramienta para fomentar la continuidad educativa en M√©xico.
